qas.question: What actress claimed she also carried on an affair with Schwarzenegger while he was with Shriver?

context: After the scandal, actress <a0_0>Brigitte Nielsen<a0_0/> came forward and stated that she too had an affair with Schwarzenegger while he was in a relationship with Shriver, saying, "Maybe I wouldn't have got into it if he said 'I'm going to marry Maria' and this is dead serious, but he didn't, and our affair carried on." When asked in 2014 "Of all the things you are famous for … which are you least proud of?", Schwarzenegger replied "I'm least proud of the mistakes I made that caused my family pain and split us up".
